case.title: Looking for my soulmate :-) - 30 (Surrey/SW London)
case.text:
Looking for my soul mate!
About me: I am Gentle, Educated to degree level (maths degree from york), Intelligent, fun, kind, attractive, loving.
Looking for: A person with good values, physically attractive, outgoing and positive, intelligent.
So give it a shot, you never know, also you should attach a picture and use the word "Uber Reality" as the subject so that I know it is not spam.
